greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Least number with the prime signature of 2^n - 1.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..256
mathematica: Table[Times @@ MapIndexed[(Prime@ First@ #2)^#1 &, #] &@ If[Length@ # == 1 && #[[1, 1]] == 1, {0}, Reverse@ Sort@ #[[All, -1]]] &@ FactorInteger[2^n - 1], {n, 69}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Nov 21 2016 *)
program: A046523(n) = my(f=vecsort(factor(n)[, 2], , 4), p); prod(i=1, #f, (p=nextprime(p+1))^f[i]) \\ From _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Aug 17 2011
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 19 2016
